mapper.select: select id, b_id, sn, battery_v, battery_a, soc, capacity, battery_status, core_num, hardware_temp, core_temp, env_temp, battery_core_v_list, battery_health_part_one, battery_health_part_two, battery_health_part_three, battery_health_part_four, battery_health_part_five, battery_health_part_six, battery_health_part_seven, create_time, update_time from t_battery_attr where id = #{id}

select id, b_id, sn, battery_v, battery_a, soc, capacity, battery_status, core_num, hardware_temp, core_temp, env_temp, battery_core_v_list, battery_health_part_one, battery_health_part_two, battery_health_part_three, battery_health_part_four, battery_health_part_five, battery_health_part_six, battery_health_part_seven, create_time, update_time from t_battery_attr limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_battery_attr(b_id, sn, battery_v, battery_a, soc, capacity, battery_status, core_num, hardware_temp, core_temp, env_temp, battery_core_v_list, battery_health_part_one, battery_health_part_two, battery_health_part_three, battery_health_part_four, battery_health_part_five, battery_health_part_six, battery_health_part_seven, create_time, update_time) values (#{bId}, #{sn}, #{batteryV}, #{batteryA}, #{soc}, #{capacity}, #{batteryStatus}, #{coreNum}, #{hardwareTemp}, #{coreTemp}, #{envTemp}, #{batteryCoreVList}, #{batteryHealthPartOne}, #{batteryHealthPartTwo}, #{batteryHealthPartThree}, #{batteryHealthPartFour}, #{batteryHealthPartFive}, #{batteryHealthPartSix}, #{batteryHealthPartSeven}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_battery_attr
b_id = #{bId},
sn = #{sn},
battery_v = #{batteryV},
battery_a = #{batteryA},
soc = #{soc},
capacity = #{capacity},
battery_status = #{batteryStatus},
core_num = #{coreNum},
hardware_temp = #{hardwareTemp},
core_temp = #{coreTemp},
env_temp = #{envTemp},
battery_core_v_list = #{batteryCoreVList},
battery_health_part_one = #{batteryHealthPartOne},
battery_health_part_two = #{batteryHealthPartTwo},
battery_health_part_three = #{batteryHealthPartThree},
battery_health_part_four = #{batteryHealthPartFour},
battery_health_part_five = #{batteryHealthPartFive},
battery_health_part_six = #{batteryHealthPartSix},
battery_health_part_seven = #{batteryHealthPartSeven},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
